lyric:
[00:00.30]I see your monsters, I see your pain.
[00:05.50]Tell me your problems, I'll chase them away.
[00:10.42]I'll be your lighthouse. I'll make it okay.
[00:16.00]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave, and chase them all away.
[00:26.50]A cup of coffee still steaming, staring back at me and it's blacker than the night, eh.
[00:32.12]I'm awake but still sleeping, I keep telling myself I'll be alright (I won't).
[00:37.63]And I know it can't get worse than today, sitting here and she's trying to rehearse what to say.
[00:42.21]See, she's in the bathroom and hoping I'm not in earshot, while she's getting used to the sound of her teardrops.
[00:47.99]Splash, it hits the tile and I know it's been a while since you've seen me smile and laugh like I used to.
[00:53.38]I've been in denial since it happened, just take me to the past, cause I just can't imagine losing you, too.
[00:59.18]I can't explain this so I keep it all inside, wear my pain but it's masked by my pride.
[01:04.32]She came to hold me and she cried, told me this and she stared into my eyes, said.
[01:08.00]I see your monsters, I see your pain.
[01:13.50]Tell me your problems, I'll chase them away.
[01:18.50]I'll be your lighthouse. I'll make it okay.
[01:24.28]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave, and chase them all away.
[01:32.00]I can't, you won't like what you see.
[01:34.50]If you were in my head and had to hear my pleas.
[01:36.88]It's like, I can't believe this is happening to me.
[01:39.55]And could someone please shut off this ******* answering machine.
[01:42.38]So I can stop leaving these messages that you will never get.
[01:45.17]And all these cries for help you'll never see, you'll never check.
[01:47.98]But I guess it's easy for you to leave me.
[01:50.39]But believe me, see this isn't something that I'm just forget.
[01:53.56]I would trade it all for one more minute, don't you see I really need you to talk to.
[01:58.15]Uh, I'm still sitting here wondering who did it, while I'm staring out our front door knowing you'll never walk through.
[02:04.38]Said you'd come right back, now you're gone like that.
[02:09.86]A blank stare as I stand so alone, and I know you're never coming home. Damn.
[02:14.00]I see your monsters, I see your pain.
[02:18.30]Tell me your problems, I'll chase them away.
[02:23.88]I'll be your lighthouse. I'll make it okay.
[02:29.73]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave, and chase them all away.
[02:37.52]Uh, I got a heart made of fools gold, got me feeling so cold，but keep chipping away.
[02:43.00]All the promises that I told, felt like I was on those, but keep slipping away.
[02:48.28]I want nobody else, but it's hard to get to know me when I don't know myself.
[02:53.10]And it helps cause I felt I was down, I was out, then you looked at me now and said.
[02:57.50]I see your monsters, I see your pain.
[03:02.16]Tell me your problems, I'll chase them away.
[03:07.92]I'll be your lighthouse. I'll make it okay.
[03:13.30]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave.
[03:19.00]I see your monsters, I see your pain.
[03:24.31]Tell me your problems, I'll chase them away.
[03:29.41]I'll be your lighthouse. I'll make it okay.
[03:35.21]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave, and chase them all away.
tlyric:
[00:00.30]我看到你心中的恶魔 看到你的痛
[00:05.50]告诉我你的问题 我会将他们驱逐
[00:10.42]我会做你的灯塔 将一切步入正轨
[00:16.00]当我看到你心中的恶魔 我会无所畏惧 将他们统统驱逐
[00:26.50]一杯热气腾腾的咖啡 她看向我 让我如坠于黑夜暮色
[00:32.12]其实我只是假寐 我不断告诉自己没事（其实不然）
[00:37.63]我知道今日不会更糟 我坐在这里 她在努力练习着要说的话
[00:42.21]看 她去了卫生间 希望我不会听到 此时她渐渐习惯了泪水的声响
[00:47.99]溅落 泪水滴落瓷砖 我知道你有一段时间没看我像过去那般笑
[00:53.38]自从事情发生后我一直在否认 让我回到过去 因为我无法想象失去你
[00:59.18]我无法解释 于是我将此深埋于心 感受我的伤痛 但伤痛被我用自尊掩盖
[01:04.32]她过来拥抱我 哭泣 她看着我的双眼对我说
[01:08.00]我看到你心中的恶魔 看到你的痛
[01:13.50]告诉我你的问题 我会将他们驱逐
[01:18.50]我会做你的灯塔 将一切步入正轨
[01:24.28]当我看到你心中的恶魔 我会无所畏惧 将他们统统驱逐
[01:32.00]我不能 你不会喜欢你所见到的
[01:34.50]如果你在我脑中 一定要聆听我的恳求
[01:36.88]这就像是 我无法相信这一切发生在我身上
[01:39.55]有没有人能把这该死的答录机关掉
[01:42.38]这样我才能停止录这些你永远收不到的留言
[01:45.17]这些你永远不会查看的呼喊
[01:47.98]但我想 离开我对你很简单
[01:50.39]但相信我 这不是我刚刚忘记的事
[01:53.56]我愿意用一切多交换一分钟 难道你看不到我真的想和你说
[01:58.15]我仍坐在这里思考是谁造成了这一切 此时我盯着前门外 知道你已不会再走进来
[02:04.38]你说马上回来 现在你却这样离开
[02:09.86]我孑然站立 双目空洞 知道你永不会再回到这个家
[02:14.00]我看到你心中的恶魔 看到你的痛
[02:18.30]告诉我你的问题 我会将他们驱逐
[02:23.88]我会做你的灯塔 将一切步入正轨
[02:29.73]当我看到你心中的恶魔 我会无所畏惧 将他们统统驱逐
[02:37.52]我有一颗傻子一样的用金铸成的心 让我感到如此寒冷 但逐渐被瓦解
[02:43.00]我许下的所有诺言 我感到自己正在履行 却逐渐流逝
[02:48.28]我不需要别人 了解我很难 连我自己也不了解自己
[02:53.10]这有所助益 因为我感受到 我跌落 我出局 现在你看着我说
[02:57.50]我看到你心中的恶魔 看到你的痛
[03:02.16]告诉我你的问题 我会将他们驱逐
[03:07.92]我会做你的灯塔 将一切步入正轨
[03:13.30]当我看到你心中的恶魔 我会无所畏惧
[03:19.00]我看到你心中的恶魔 看到你的痛
[03:24.31]告诉我你的问题 我会将他们驱逐
[03:29.41]我会做你的灯塔 将一切步入正轨
[03:35.21]当我看到你心中的恶魔 我会无所畏惧 将他们统统驱逐
